abstract: Letter from Rep Barbara Lee responds to October 28 editorial criticizing Obama administration's strategy for combating Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: Barbara Lee of the Congressional Progressive Caucus and another reader warn of the dangers of further United States involvement.

headline.main: The Danger of a Quagmire in Iraq and Syria
headline.print_headline: The Danger of a Quagmire in Iraq and Syria
